actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to better connect current and former members of the Armed Forces with employment opportunities by consolidating duplicative Federal Government Internet websites into a single portal, to conserve resources by merging redundant and competing programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: United We Stand to Hire Veterans Act

titles.title: United We Stand to Hire Veterans Act

A bill to better connect current and former members of the Armed Forces with employment opportunities by consolidating duplicative Federal Government Internet websites into a single portal, to conserve resources by merging redundant and competing programs, and for other purposes.
